overview.title: Overview
overview.content: yada yada meetings general info, meetings are called ceremonies cause fancy crap is happening, bloody sacrifices and drinking your enemies tears from wolf skulls

meetings.name: Project Planning
meetings.when: At the beginning of the project
meetings.how: talk with the stakeholders or the client

meetings.name: Sprint Planning
meetings.when: At the beginning of the sprint

meetings.name: Daily Stand-Up
meetings.how: what you did, what you do, issues

meetings.name: Review
meetings.aims: show off MVP, get feedback from SH

meetings.name: Retrospective
meetings.when: At the end of sprint, possibly after the Review
meetings.how: talk, discuss the problems in a structured way
